name: Underwater Pressure
description:
How to play?

You control a cute little fish. The fish will follow your cursor and shoot automatically.

The fish cannot shoot if your cursor is close to him. So try to find the best strategy to win.

For a better experience, play on full screen (This avoid some graphic bugs).

How does the game fit the theme?

When I heard the word "pressure", the first thing that came to mind was the underwater, indeed the pressure rises when you dive deeper and deeper into the water, and that's the relation with the theme "pressure rises".

Credits:

Music by JuliusH from Pixabay
